en.purpose: To provide clear diagnostic criteria and differential diagnosis guidance for Rumination Syndrome, avoiding misdiagnosis with conditions such as GERD, gastroparesis, and eating disorders.
en.misuse: Do not use in patients with Rule out GERD, gastroparesis, cyclic vomiting, and eating disorders.
en.use: Use in patients with symptoms present for â‰¥3 months, onset at least 6 months before diagnosis and no evidence of structural abnormalities.
